name: gustavo
description: A (mostly) headless blogging platform built atop Nuxt & Gist.
author: Brian Gonzalez <me@briangonzalez.org>

scripts.dev: nodemon --exec babel-node server/index.js -w nuxt.config.js -w gustavo.config.js -w src/
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run copy-app && babel --out-dir ./build . -s --ignore node_modules,build,assets,components,dummy,layouts,middleware,pages,plugins,static,store > /dev/null 2>&1
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm build && (NODE_ENV=production node build/server/index.js)
scripts.docker-publish: docker build -t eggplanet/gustavo . && docker push eggplanet/gustavo
